name: Zachs Arch
description: In a humanless world there is only machines who roam the planet, there is no sign of natural life. with a planet on the verge of death the world is no being led by xcebra. a leader who'll see to it that the machines can move on without the Human race. Zach-Unit 705. has come to a disgusting reality when his mission to protect and serve has did nothing more than made him a pawn to a much bigger game.
